item_bow_stave.name: Bow Stave
item_bow_stave.description: A fair, but rather heavy bow stave, offering tension through strength.

item_bow_stave_coarse.description: Considering how short you have been practicing fletching, this attempt at a bow stave is not bad at all.

item_bow_stave_rough.name: Rough Bow Stave
item_bow_stave_rough.description: Considering how long you have been practicing fletching, this attempt at a bow stave is not bad at all.

item_material_ale_base_cloudy.description: The fermented and ready to bottle base condition for your tasty drink.

item_material_animal_tallow.description: Rendered suet. A pure fat product that is valuable for all sorts of crafting processes.

item_material_axe_handle.description: A rugged wooden haft designed to withstand impact force.

item_material_axe_handle_fine.description: A balanced and reinforced handle, carved for optimized swing.

item_material_bee_honey.name: Honey
item_material_bee_honey.description: The floral scent belies its sticky sweetness.

item_material_bee_wax.name: Beeswax
item_material_bee_wax.description: Tacky with an oily texture. Beeswax has a range of uses including in candles and beauty products.

item_material_beer_base_cloudy.name: Cloudy Beer Base
item_material_beer_base_cloudy.description: The fermented and ready to bottle base condition for your tasty drink.

item_material_beer_base_weak.description: The fermented and ready to bottle base condition for your tasty drink.

item_material_bronze_axe_blade.description: One short shaft away from glory.

item_material_bronze_bar.description: A long, shaped piece of raw metal.

item_material_bronze_sheet.description: Sheet of metal, processed and ready to be shaped to the crafters needs.

item_material_bronze_spike.name: Bronze Spike
item_material_bronze_spike.description: For when a nail is not enough.

item_material_button_gold.name: Aurum Buttons
item_material_button_gold.description: Decorative fasteners crafted from or plated with gold.

item_material_button_horn.name: Horn Buttons
item_material_button_horn.description: Buttons shaped from polished horn, durable and natural.

item_material_button_silver.name: Silver Buttons
item_material_button_silver.description: Metal buttons with shine and resilience.

item_material_button_wood.name: Wood Buttons
item_material_button_wood.description: Simple, carved fasteners made from treated wood.

item_material_clay_shingles.name: Clay Shingles
item_material_clay_shingles.description: A roofing tile made of baked clay.

item_material_cotton_cloth.name: Cotton Cloth
item_material_cotton_cloth.description: The manufacturing of cotton is said to have originated in Anatolia.

item_material_cotton_string.name: Cotton Cord
item_material_cotton_string.description: Smooth and strong cord made of cotton.

item_material_cotton_wadding.name: Cotton Wadding
item_material_cotton_wadding.description: A soft inner fill used for warmth or insulation beneath armor.

item_material_crafting_iron_anvil_head.name: Iron Anvil Head
item_material_crafting_iron_anvil_head.description: Used to make some Forge Parts.

item_material_crafting_sewing_needles.name: Sewing Needles
item_material_crafting_sewing_needles.description: Used for sewing and stitching when making clothes.

item_material_crafting_steel_anvil_head.name: Steel Anvil Head
item_material_crafting_steel_anvil_head.description: Necessary to make the Craftsman Forge Parts.

item_material_dough_barley.name: Barley Dough
item_material_dough_barley.description: Hearty and rustic, it carries a nutty essence and promises a comforting taste of tradition with every bite.

item_material_dough_oat.name: Oat Dough
item_material_dough_oat.description: Coarse yet comforting, it cradles hints of nuttiness and earthiness, promising wholesome satisfaction with each bite.

item_material_dough_rye.name: Rye Dough
item_material_dough_rye.description: Hearty and dense, it whispers of earthiness and warmth, promising a rustic indulgence.

item_material_dough_wheat.name: Wheat Dough
item_material_dough_wheat.description: A golden canvas, supple and elastic, ready to yield to the hands of the artisan, promising warmth, nourishment, and the aroma of home.

item_material_enchanting_extract_crude.name: Ambergrasp Extract
item_material_enchanting_extract_crude.description: Fresh sap roughly drawn from Ambergrasp, thick and cloudy. The work of a novice alchemist.

item_material_enchanting_extract_exquisi.name: Ambergrasp Resin
item_material_enchanting_extract_exquisi.description: Crystalized Ambergrasp sap, smooth and warm to the touch.

item_material_enchanting_extract_fine.name: Ambergrasp Concentrate
item_material_enchanting_extract_fine.description: A denser, purified form of Ambergrasp sap that glows faintly.

item_material_enchanting_powder_crude.name: Chiseled Canonites
item_material_enchanting_powder_crude.description: Jagged Canonite fragments roughly cut from shattered Papal constructs. Their scorched faces bear broken lines of scripture, most too worn to read.

item_material_enchanting_powder_exquisit.name: Canonite Pearls
item_material_enchanting_powder_exquisit.description: A perfectly rounded Canonite relic, polished to a soft sheen. Only a few pristine runes remain, glowing faintly with lingering holy power.”

item_material_enchanting_powder_fine.name: Rounded Canonites
item_material_enchanting_powder_fine.description: Canonite stones ground and shaped smooth. Circular bands of scripture wrap their surface, faintly glowing where blessings remain intact.

item_material_extract_amanitaregalis.name: Amanita Regalis Extract
item_material_extract_amanitaregalis.description: Elixir sought for its mystical properties in the alchemist's quest for enlightenment.

item_material_extract_berserker.name: Fly Agaric Extract
item_material_extract_berserker.description: Extract of primal fury, by commoners thought to unlock untamed strength in the hearts of warriors.

item_material_extract_deathcap.name: Death Cap Extract
item_material_extract_deathcap.description: Bewitched essence, harbinger of peril and power in the alchemical arts.

item_material_extract_fools_webcap.name: Fool's Webcap Extract
item_material_extract_fools_webcap.description: Concoction of trickery, believed to veil secrets and ensnare the senses.

item_material_extract_loios_tears.name: Extract from Loios' Tears
item_material_extract_loios_tears.description: Precious drops of compassion and love.

item_material_extract_plant_bushy_starwo.name: Starwort Extract
item_material_extract_plant_bushy_starwo.description: Celestial elixir, imbued with the magic of the cosmos in the alchemist's pursuit of divine knowledge.

item_material_extract_plant_castor_plant.name: Castor Extract
item_material_extract_plant_castor_plant.description: Extract of transformation, said to unlock the gates to other realms in the hands of the skilled alchemist.

item_material_extract_plant_crown_beard.name: Crown Beard Extract
item_material_extract_plant_crown_beard.description: Essence of sovereignty, revered for its ability to bestow regal wisdom upon the enlightened.

item_material_extract_plant_daisy.name: Daisy Extract
item_material_extract_plant_daisy.description: Blossom of innocence, prized for its purity and mythic properties.

item_material_extract_plant_dandelion.name: Dandelion Extract
item_material_extract_plant_dandelion.description: Elixir of resilience, known for its ability to fortify the body and spirit in the alchemist's pursuit of vitality.

item_material_extract_plant_flower_alfal.name: Alfalfa Extract
item_material_extract_plant_flower_alfal.description: Essence of abundance, believed to attract prosperity and fertility in the alchemical arts.

item_material_extract_plant_flower_batfl.name: Batflower Extract
item_material_extract_plant_flower_batfl.description: Shadowed Extract, said to harness the mysteries of the night in the alchemist's quest for arcane knowledge.

item_material_extract_plant_flower_calif.name: Golden Poppy Extract
item_material_extract_plant_flower_calif.description: Nectar of joy, revered for its ability to soothe the troubled mind and lift the spirit.

item_material_extract_plant_flower_campi.name: Bladder Campion Extract
item_material_extract_plant_flower_campi.description: Extract of protection, whispered to shield the soul from harm in the hands of the alchemist.

item_material_extract_plant_flower_crane.name: Crane Flower Extract
item_material_extract_plant_flower_crane.description: Elixir of grace, believed to bestow elegance and beauty upon those who partake.

item_material_extract_plant_flower_datur.name: Datura Fruit Extract
item_material_extract_plant_flower_datur.description: Forbidden fruit, said to unlock visions of the beyond in the alchemist's pursuit of enlightenment.

item_material_extract_plant_flower_datur.name: Datura Leaf Extract
item_material_extract_plant_flower_datur.description: Leaf of delirium, known to blur the boundaries between worlds in the hands of the adept alchemist.

item_material_extract_plant_flower_deadl.name: Deadly Nightshade Fruit Extract
item_material_extract_plant_flower_deadl.description: Extract of shadows, believed to hold the secrets of the underworld in ancient alchemy.

item_material_extract_plant_flower_deadl.name: Deadly Nightshade Leaf Extract
item_material_extract_plant_flower_deadl.description: Leaf of darkness, said to veil the mind in the mysteries of the night.

item_material_extract_plant_flower_highm.name: High Mallow Extract
item_material_extract_plant_flower_highm.description: Elixir of tranquility, known to calm the restless soul and soothe troubled spirits.

item_material_extract_plant_flower_laven.name: Lavender Extract
item_material_extract_plant_flower_laven.description: Essence of serenity, cherished for its ability to bring peace and harmony to the alchemist's laboratory.

item_material_extract_plant_flower_loios.name: Loios' Tears Leaf Extract
item_material_extract_plant_flower_loios.description: An extract from a legendary plant, with tiny, gleaming pieces of residue suspended and playing with the light.

item_material_extract_plant_flower_pasqu.name: Pasque Flower Extract
item_material_extract_plant_flower_pasqu.description: Blossom of rebirth, whispered to awaken dormant potential in the alchemist's hands.

item_material_extract_plant_flower_plant.name: Plantago Extract
item_material_extract_plant_flower_plant.description: Extract of healing, known for its ability to mend wounds and soothe ailments in the alchemist's art.

item_material_extract_plant_flower_redpo.name: Red Poppy Extract
item_material_extract_plant_flower_redpo.description: Essence of dreams, believed to unlock the gates to the realm of visions.

item_material_extract_plant_flower_soapw.name: Soapwort Extract
item_material_extract_plant_flower_soapw.description: Cleansing elixir, revered for its ability to purify body and soul in the hands of the alchemist.

item_material_extract_plant_flower_tansy.name: Tansy Extract
item_material_extract_plant_flower_tansy.description: Herb of protection, believed to ward off malevolent forces and bring fortune to the alchemist's endeavors.

item_material_extract_plant_flower_wolfs.description: Extract of transformation, said to harness the primal energies of the wolf in the hands of the adept alchemist.

item_material_extract_plant_flower_wolfs.name: Wolfsbane Seed Extract
item_material_extract_plant_flower_wolfs.description: Seed of power, whispered to unlock the secrets of the hunt in alchemical lore.

item_material_extract_plant_herb_angelic.name: Angelica Extract
item_material_extract_plant_herb_angelic.description: Essence of celestial guidance, believed to bring clarity and insight to the alchemist's mind.

item_material_extract_plant_herb_lily.name: Lily of the Valley Extract
item_material_extract_plant_herb_lily.description: Elixir of purity, revered for its ability to cleanse and protect.

item_material_extract_plant_herb_meadows.name: Meadowsweet Extract
item_material_extract_plant_herb_meadows.description: Blossom of enchantment, believed to attract love and joy to the alchemist's life.

item_material_extract_plant_periwinkle.name: Periwinkle Extract
item_material_extract_plant_periwinkle.description: Extract of memory, whispered to unlock forgotten knowledge in the alchemist's quest for wisdom.

item_material_extract_plant_sowthistle.name: Sow Thistle Extract
item_material_extract_plant_sowthistle.description: Herb of fortune, believed to bring luck and prosperity to the alchemist's endeavors.

item_material_extract_skullcap.name: Skullcap Extract
item_material_extract_skullcap.description: Poisonous extract? Should be used with care.

item_material_extract_stinkhorn.name: Elegant Stinkhorn Extract
item_material_extract_stinkhorn.description: Elixir of allure, whispered to ensnare the senses and captivate the heart.

item_material_steel_studs.description: Small pieces of metal used to connect items together or strengthen them.

item_material_steel_sword_blade.name: Steel Sword Blade
item_material_steel_sword_blade.description: Blade for making a regular steel sword.

item_material_steel_wire.name: Steel Wire
item_material_steel_wire.description: A long thin strand of steel which is both flexible and strong.

item_material_stuffed_padding_linen.name: Stuffed Linen Padding
item_material_stuffed_padding_linen.description: Linen casing packed with natural fiber, used in under-armor garments.

item_material_sword_hilt.name: Sword Hilt
item_material_sword_hilt.description: The heart of any blade’s balance, where hand meets steel. Includes the guard, grip, and socket for the tang.

item_material_sword_hilt_fine.name: Fine Sword Hilt
item_material_sword_hilt_fine.description: A crafted hilt with ornamental or enhanced grip materials.

item_material_thread_gold.name: Aurum Thread
item_material_thread_gold.description: A sturdy textile thread meticulously coated in gold leaf.

item_material_thread_silver.name: Silver Thread
item_material_thread_silver.description: A base thread finely wrapped in hammered silver.

item_material_tiles_glazed.name: Glazed Tiles
item_material_tiles_glazed.description: Fired ceramic tiles coated in a protective glossy layer.

item_material_whitewine_base_cloudy.name: Cloudy White Wine Base
item_material_whitewine_base_cloudy.description: The fermented and ready to bottle base condition for your tasty drink.

item_material_whitewine_base_weak.name: Weak White Wine Base
item_material_whitewine_base_weak.description: The fermented and ready to bottle base condition for your tasty drink.

item_material_wood_long_stock.name: Long Wood Stock
item_material_wood_long_stock.description: For making handles for tools and weapons.

item_material_wood_long_stock_fine.name: Long Fine Wood Stock
item_material_wood_long_stock_fine.description: For making handles for tools and weapons.

item_material_wood_short_stock.name: Short Wood Stock
item_material_wood_short_stock.description: For making handles for tools and weapons and other uses.

item_material_wood_short_stock_fine.name: Short Fine Wood Stock
item_material_wood_short_stock_fine.description: For making handles for tools and weapons and other uses.

item_material_wool_cloth.name: Wool Cloth
item_material_wool_cloth.description: A piece of comfort and warmth.

item_material_wrought_iron_arrowhead.name: Wrought Iron Arrowhead
item_material_wrought_iron_arrowhead.description: The business end of an arrow.

item_material_wrought_iron_axe_blade.name: Wrought Iron Axe Head
item_material_wrought_iron_axe_blade.description: The main component when making a regular axe.

item_material_wrought_iron_cuirass.name: Wrought Iron Cuirass
item_material_wrought_iron_cuirass.description: Armor torso piece forged from malleable iron.

item_material_wrought_iron_hinges.name: Wrought Iron Hinges
item_material_wrought_iron_hinges.description: Windows, doors, and chests must open and close. These hand-forged hinges make that possible. Simple in purpose, sturdy in design, essential in every build.

item_material_wrought_iron_lames.name: Wrought Iron Lames
item_material_wrought_iron_lames.description: Interlocking iron strips used in articulated armor.

item_material_wrought_iron_sheet.name: Wrought Iron Sheet
item_material_wrought_iron_sheet.description: A flat, hammered sheet of metal.

item_material_yeast.name: Yeast
item_material_yeast.description: Mysterious substance, bestowed upon bakers by the grace of the heavens.

item_raw_material_animal_carcass_bear.name: Bear Carcass
item_raw_material_animal_carcass_bear.description: A formidable presence, now a source of sustenance for both predator and scavenger, embodying the raw power and primal instincts of the untamed wilderness.

item_raw_material_animal_carcass_boar.name: Boar Carcass
item_raw_material_animal_carcass_boar.description: A robust offering from the wild, providing sustenance and strength to those who rely on the bounty of the forest for survival.

item_raw_material_animal_carcass_deer.name: Deer Carcass
item_raw_material_animal_carcass_deer.description: Nature's bounty, sustaining life in the forest.

item_raw_material_animal_carcass_rabbit.name: Rabbit Carcass
item_raw_material_animal_carcass_rabbit.description: Once a symbol of life and vitality, now a humble offering to sustain those in need, embodying the cycle of nature and the resourcefulness of survival in the wilderness.

item_raw_material_animal_carcass_wolf.name: Wolf Carcass
item_raw_material_animal_carcass_wolf.description: Once a hunter of the wild, now a provider for the ecosystem, sustaining life in the forest's intricate web of existence.

item_raw_material_animal_hoofs.name: Animal Hoof
item_raw_material_animal_hoofs.description: Both hard and supple crafting material.

item_raw_material_animal_sinew.name: Sinew
item_raw_material_animal_sinew.description: Thin and strong material for crafting, especially bow strings.

item_raw_material_enchanting_demira_resi.name: Ambergrasp
item_raw_material_enchanting_demira_resi.description: A dark, thorny plant with coiled branches gripping a glowing humming amber sap. \nCan be gathered in all biomes in the Lyonesse.

item_raw_material_enchanting_shard.name: Canonite
item_raw_material_enchanting_shard.description: Broken chunks of stone scorched and marked by faint inscriptions. Many believe them cursed, for even the Inquisition avoids their touch. \nCan be gathered in all biomes in the Lyonesse.

item_raw_material_gemstone_amber.name: Amber
item_raw_material_gemstone_amber.description: Congealed drops of sweat from ancient trees. \nFound by mining Iron deposits in all biomes in the Home Valleys and Wildlands.

item_raw_material_gemstone_blizzard_ston.name: Blizzard Stone
item_raw_material_gemstone_blizzard_ston.description: The poor man's diamond. \nFound by mining Copper, Gneiss, Iron, Limestone and Tin deposits in all biomes.

item_raw_material_gemstone_citrine.name: Citrine
item_raw_material_gemstone_citrine.description: Rays of the sun, trapped in a gem. \nFound by mining Copper, Gneiss, Iron, Limestone and Tin deposits in all biomes.

item_raw_material_gemstone_emeralds.name: Emerald
item_raw_material_gemstone_emeralds.description: A gemstone of life. \nFound by mining Granite and Iron deposits in all biomes in the Lyonesse and Wildlands.

item_raw_material_gemstone_garnet.name: Garnet
item_raw_material_gemstone_garnet.description: A protective stone said to hold a drop of pure fire within its heart. \nFound by mining Copper, Gneiss, Iron, Limestone and Tin deposits in all biomes.

item_raw_material_gemstone_obsidian.name: Obsidian
item_raw_material_gemstone_obsidian.description: A fragment of the darkest night. \nFound by mining Copper, Gneiss, Iron, Limestone and Tin deposits in all biomes.

item_raw_material_gemstone_onyx.name: Onyx
item_raw_material_gemstone_onyx.description: Dampens love and is said to cause misfortune. \nFound by mining Iron deposits in all biomes in the Home Valleys and Wildlands.

item_raw_material_gemstone_opal.name: Opal
item_raw_material_gemstone_opal.description: Strands of the rainbow, trapped in a gem. \nFound by mining Iron deposits in all biomes in the Wildlands.

item_raw_material_gemstone_pearls.name: Pearl
item_raw_material_gemstone_pearls.description: Reflections of the moon on the ocean of time. \nFound by mining Granite and Iron deposits in all biomes in the Lyonesse and Wildlands.

item_raw_material_gemstone_topaz.name: Topaz
item_raw_material_gemstone_topaz.description: The stone that harmonizes most fortunately with gold. \nFound by mining Copper, Gneiss, Iron, Limestone and Tin deposits in all biomes.

item_raw_material_gemstone_tourmaline.name: Tourmaline
item_raw_material_gemstone_tourmaline.description: A stone to bring clarity of mind. \nFound by mining Iron deposits in all biomes in the Wildlands.

item_raw_material_grain_barley.name: Barley Grain
item_raw_material_grain_barley.description: A versatile and ancient cereal crop, prized for its nutritional value and used in brewing, cooking, and animal feed throughout history. \nCan be gathered in Lands of Stone and Scrublands biomes in the Home Valleys.

item_raw_material_grain_oat.name: Oat Grain
item_raw_material_grain_oat.description: A hearty and nutritious cereal crop, renowned for its versatility in various culinary applications, from breakfast cereals to baking and brewing. \nCan be gathered in Old Forest and Lands of Stone biomes.

item_raw_material_grain_rye.name: Rye Grain
item_raw_material_grain_rye.description: Rye grain, a sturdy crop that withstands the harshest winters, provides bread to fill our bellies and strength to toil the fields. \nCan be gathered in Lands of Stone, Scrublands and 2 other biomes.

item_raw_material_grain_wheat.name: Wheat Grain
item_raw_material_grain_wheat.description: The lifeblood of our sustenance, harvested with sweat and toil, yielding the golden flour that feeds our families and sustains our villages. \nCan be gathered in The Pale.

item_raw_material_grass_barley.name: Barley Stalks
item_raw_material_grass_barley.description: A humble yet essential crop, harvested from the earth's bounty, offering nourishment in the form of hearty bread, sustaining us through the seasons of toil and harvest. \nCan be gathered in Lands of Stone and Scrublands biomes in the Home Valleys.

item_raw_material_grass_reeds.name: Reed
item_raw_material_grass_reeds.description: Poor man's wood. \nCan be gathered in all biomes near water.

item_raw_material_large_animal_hide.name: Large Animal Hide
item_raw_material_large_animal_hide.description: A fair quality animal hide. Must be cut to produce usable animal hide.

item_raw_material_large_animal_hide_roug.name: Large Rough Animal Hide
item_raw_material_large_animal_hide_roug.description: A low-quality animal hide. Must be cut to produce usable animal hide.

item_raw_material_medium_animal_hide.name: Animal Hide
item_raw_material_medium_animal_hide.description: A fair quality animal hide, ready to be processed in the tannery.

item_raw_material_medium_animal_hide_rou.name: Rough Animal Hide
item_raw_material_medium_animal_hide_rou.description: A low-quality hide, ready to be dried and cleaned for making rawhide, or to be processed into leather.

item_raw_material_mineral_agate.name: Agate
item_raw_material_mineral_agate.description: Nature's artwork, a mesmerizing display of swirling colors and patterns, forged in the depths of the earth and cherished for its beauty and symbolism throughout the ages. \nFound by mining Granite and Iron deposits in all biomes in the Lyonesse and Wildlands.

item_raw_material_mineral_cuprite.name: Cuprite
item_raw_material_mineral_cuprite.description: The crimson heart of the earth, its fiery hue captivating alchemists' imaginations, believed to hold secrets of transformation and vitality within its radiant depths. \nFound by mining Granite and Iron deposits in all biomes in the Lyonesse and Wildlands.

item_raw_material_mineral_fluorite.name: Fluorite
item_raw_material_mineral_fluorite.description: Mystical gem, enhances alchemical transformations. \nFound by mining Granite and Iron deposits in all biomes in the Lyonesse and Wildlands.

item_raw_material_mineral_hematite.name: Hematite
item_raw_material_mineral_hematite.description: Earth's magnetic gem, revered by alchemists for its transformative powers. \nFound by mining Iron deposits in all biomes in the Wildlands.

item_raw_material_mineral_lead.name: Lead
item_raw_material_mineral_lead.description: One of Alchemist's base metals, a cornerstone of transformation and other ancient alchemical endeavors. \nFound by mining Copper, Gneiss, Iron, Limestone and Tin deposits in all biomes.

item_raw_material_mineral_magnetite.name: Magnetite
item_raw_material_mineral_magnetite.description: Nature's magnetic marvel, revered by alchemists for its potent energy and transformative properties. \nFound by mining Copper, Gneiss, Iron, Limestone and Tin deposits in all biomes.

item_raw_material_mineral_pyrite.name: Pyrite
item_raw_material_mineral_pyrite.description: Earth's golden illusion, captivating alchemists with its deceptive beauty and transformative potential. \nFound by mining Iron deposits in all biomes in the Home Valleys and Wildlands.

item_raw_material_mineral_quartz.name: Quartz
item_raw_material_mineral_quartz.description: Earth's crystal guardian, revered by alchemists for its clarity and amplification of energies. \nFound by mining Iron deposits in all biomes in the Home Valleys and Wildlands.

item_raw_material_mineral_quicksilver.name: Quicksilver
item_raw_material_mineral_quicksilver.description: One of the three Primes of Alchemy. \nFound by mining Granite and Iron deposits in all biomes in the Lyonesse and Wildlands.

item_raw_material_mineral_sepentine.name: Serpentine
item_raw_material_mineral_sepentine.description: This stone has been described as being extra natural. \nFound by mining Granite and Iron deposits in all biomes in the Lyonesse and Wildlands.

item_raw_material_mineral_sulfur.name: Sulfur
item_raw_material_mineral_sulfur.description: One of the three Primes of Alchemy. \nFound by mining Iron deposits in all biomes in the Wildlands.

item_raw_material_mineral_turquoise.name: Turquoise
item_raw_material_mineral_turquoise.description: Some believe the turquoise can warn its bearer of impending danger. \nFound by mining Granite and Iron deposits in all biomes in the Lyonesse and Wildlands.

item_raw_material_ore_copper.name: Copper Ore
item_raw_material_ore_copper.description: Lifeblood of the ancient miners. \nFound by mining Copper deposits in all biomes in the Home Valleys.

item_raw_material_ore_gold.name: Aurum Ore
item_raw_material_ore_gold.description: Valuable metal, smelt it into coins and ingots. \nFound by mining Gneiss, Granite and Limestone deposits.

item_raw_material_ore_iron.name: Iron Ore
item_raw_material_ore_iron.description: Smelt it down. \nFound by mining Iron deposits in all biomes in the Wildlands.

item_raw_material_ore_iron_impure.name: Impure Iron Ore
item_raw_material_ore_iron_impure.description: Impure iron ore, wrested from the bowels of the earth by the sweat of laborers' brows. \nFound by mining Iron deposits in all biomes in the Home Valleys.

item_raw_material_ore_iron_pure.name: Pure Iron Ore
item_raw_material_ore_iron_pure.description: High quality iron ore. \nFound by mining Iron deposits in all biomes in the Lyonesse and Wildlands.

item_raw_material_ore_silver.name: Silver Ore
item_raw_material_ore_silver.description: Smelt it down. \nFound by mining Gneiss, Granite and Limestone deposits.

item_raw_material_ore_tin.name: Tin Ore
item_raw_material_ore_tin.description: Soft, dull to the eye. \nFound by mining Tin deposits in all biomes in the Home Valleys.

item_raw_material_plant_cabbage_red.name: Red Cabbage
item_raw_material_plant_cabbage_red.description: Food fit for kings. And pigs. \nCan be gathered in Lands of Stone in the Wildlands.

item_raw_material_plant_fiber_cotton.name: Cotton Fiber
item_raw_material_plant_fiber_cotton.description: A soft fiber, used to make finer and more comfortable textiles. \nCan be gathered in Drowned Lands.

item_raw_material_plant_fiber_flax.name: Flax Fiber
item_raw_material_plant_fiber_flax.description: Strong fibrous plant, used to make linen. \nCan be gathered in Grasslands, Blessed Meadows and 2 other biomes.

item_raw_material_plant_fiber_flax_seeds.name: Flax Seeds
item_raw_material_plant_fiber_flax_seeds.description: Tiny, glossy seeds harvested from the flax plant. \nCan be gathered in Grasslands, Blessed Meadows and 2 other biomes.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_alfalfa.name: Alfalfa
item_raw_material_plant_flower_alfalfa.description: Vigorous legume with vibrant green foliage, enriches soils and serves as a nutritious fodder for livestock, sustaining farms and fields with its abundant growth. \nCan be gathered in Scrublands and The Pale biomes.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_alpine_ju.name: Juniper Needles
item_raw_material_plant_flower_alpine_ju.description: Hardy foliage of mountainous regions, exuding a resinous scent and is resilient in harsh climates.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_batflower.name: Batflower
item_raw_material_plant_flower_batflower.description: Dark, intricate blossom, evokes twilight magic. \nCan be gathered in Forsaken Forest in the Wildlands.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_beardedir.name: Bearded Iris
item_raw_material_plant_flower_beardedir.description: Majestic blooms with velvety petals, crowned by fuzzy "beards," lending regal elegance and vibrant color to gardens and landscapes alike. \nCan be gathered in Grasslands in the Wildlands.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_bushy_sta.name: Starwort
item_raw_material_plant_flower_bushy_sta.description: A humble plant. \nCan be gathered in Forsaken Forest.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_californi.name: Golden Poppy
item_raw_material_plant_flower_californi.description: A floral treasure. \nCan be gathered in The Pale.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_campion.name: Bladder Campion
item_raw_material_plant_flower_campion.description: Delicate wildflower with inflated calyxes, its white petals dance in the breeze, adorning meadows and hedgerows with ephemeral beauty. \nCan be gathered in The Pale in the Wildlands.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_castor_pl.name: Castor Plant
item_raw_material_plant_flower_castor_pl.description: Produces slow burning oil that is also said to be used to purge evil. \nCan be gathered in Drowned Lands.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_crane.name: Crane Flower
item_raw_material_plant_flower_crane.description: Exotic bloom, reminiscent of crane wings, captivates with vibrant hues. \nCan be gathered in Drowned Lands.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_crown_bea.name: Crown Beard
item_raw_material_plant_flower_crown_bea.description: Majestic wildflower, its golden clusters resembling regal crowns, gracing meadows with a touch of royal splendor. \nCan be gathered in Drowned Lands.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_daisy.name: Daisy
item_raw_material_plant_flower_daisy.description: A delicate bloom of the meadows, whispering tales of innocence and simplicity, adorning fields with its cheerful presence. \nCan be gathered in Grasslands and Scrublands biomes.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_dandelion.name: Dandelion
item_raw_material_plant_flower_dandelion.description: Cheerful yellow flower, offers culinary and herbal benefits. \nCan be gathered in Grasslands.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_datura_le.name: Datura's Leaves
item_raw_material_plant_flower_datura_le.description: Velvety green foliage, adorned with intricate veins, harboring the potent essence of the night, veiled in an aura of mystique and danger. \nCan be gathered in Scrublands.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_datura_se.name: Datura's Seed Pod
item_raw_material_plant_flower_datura_se.description: A curious orb, resembling a prickly vessel of secrets, harboring potent seeds within, enticing curious minds with its mystical allure and enigmatic beauty. \nCan be gathered in Scrublands.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_edelweis.name: Edelweiss
item_raw_material_plant_flower_edelweis.description: An emblem of purity and resilience, its woolly white petals are though to symbolize courage and enduring beauty. \nCan be gathered in Cursed Rocklands in the Wildlands.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_hemlock_r.name: Hemlock Roots
item_raw_material_plant_flower_hemlock_r.description: Twisted and deadly, buried in the earth's embrace. \nCan be gathered in Drowned Lands in the Wildlands.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_hemlock_s.name: Hemlock Sap
item_raw_material_plant_flower_hemlock_s.description: Lethal essence, coursing through twisted veins, harboring nature's silent killer, a sinister whisper in the forest's shadows. \nCan be gathered in Drowned Lands in the Wildlands.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_henbane_s.name: Henbane Seeds
item_raw_material_plant_flower_henbane_s.description: Tiny orbs of peril, nestled within sinister pods, their innocent appearance belies the deadly potency they hold, a warning whispered by the winds of the wild. \nCan be gathered in Scrublands, Corrupted Plains and Drowned Lands biomes.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_highmallo.name: High Mallow
item_raw_material_plant_flower_highmallo.description: A resilient herb of the wild, its tall stems adorned with pale pink blooms, offering medicinal properties and a touch of grace to untamed landscapes. \nCan be gathered in The Pale.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_hops.name: Hops
item_raw_material_plant_flower_hops.description: The fragrant, bitter flowers of the hop plant, essential for brewing beer, imparting aroma, flavor, and bitterness. \nCan be gathered in Forsaken Forest in the Wildlands.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_lavender.name: Lavender
item_raw_material_plant_flower_lavender.description: A fragrant treasure of nature, its delicate purple blooms release an aromatic symphony, enchanting the air with a calming embrace. \nCan be gathered in Drowned Lands.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_loios_tea.name: Loios' Tears Leaves
item_raw_material_plant_flower_loios_tea.description: Leaves of wisdom, believed to hold the knowledge of the ages in the alchemist's quest for enlightenment. \nCan be gathered in Eerie Pines in the Wildlands.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_marshmeri.name: Marsh Marigold
item_raw_material_plant_flower_marshmeri.description: A cheerful herald of spring, its golden blooms brightening damp meadows and stream banks, welcoming the return of warmth and life to the marshy realms. \nCan be gathered in Drowned Lands.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_pasque.name: Pasque Flower
item_raw_material_plant_flower_pasque.description: A delicate harbinger of spring, its velvet petals unfurling amidst the lingering frost, symbolizing renewal and hope in the awakening of nature's slumber. \nCan be gathered in Lands of Stone.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_periwinkl.name: Periwinkle
item_raw_material_plant_flower_periwinkl.description: Delicate woodland flower, carpets the forest floor in hues of blue. \nCan be gathered in Grasslands.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_plantago.name: Plantago
item_raw_material_plant_flower_plantago.description: A humble herb of the fields, its slender stems and ribbed leaves offer healing properties and sustenance, quietly thriving amidst nature's tapestry. \nCan be gathered in Grasslands.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_rain_lily.name: Rain Lily
item_raw_material_plant_flower_rain_lily.description: Lily that typically blooms following heavy rains. \nCan be gathered in all biomes near water.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_redpoppy.name: Red Poppy
item_raw_material_plant_flower_redpoppy.description: A vibrant symbol of remembrance, its scarlet petals dance in the wind, honoring the sacrifices of the fallen with timeless grace and solemn beauty. \nCan be gathered in Lands of Stone.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_soapwort.name: Soapwort
item_raw_material_plant_flower_soapwort.description: A hardy herb of ancient lore, its frothy white blooms and cleansing properties have been cherished through the ages, offering purity and freshness to those who seek it. \nCan be gathered in Scrublands.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_sowthistl.name: Sow Thistle
item_raw_material_plant_flower_sowthistl.description: Hardy wild plant, prized by foragers. \nCan be gathered in Lands of Stone and Scrublands biomes.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_tansy.name: Tansy
item_raw_material_plant_flower_tansy.description: A hardy herb of the countryside, its sunny yellow blossoms and aromatic leaves bring cheer to meadows and hedgerows, warding off pests and delighting passersby with its vibrant presence. \nCan be gathered in Lands of Stone.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_wolfsbane.name: Wolfsbane's Leaves
item_raw_material_plant_flower_wolfsbane.description: Dark and ominous, their serrated edges and deep green hue conceal nature's deadly poison, a silent warning to all who tread among the shadows of the forest. \nCan be gathered in Evergreen Forest and Cursed Rocklands biomes.

item_raw_material_plant_flower_wolfsbane.name: Wolfsbane's Seeds
item_raw_material_plant_flower_wolfsbane.description: Tiny capsules of danger, nestled within the sinister embrace of the plant's foliage, harboring lethal toxins and whispered tales of the wild's dark secrets. \nCan be gathered in Evergreen Forest and Cursed Rocklands biomes.

item_raw_material_plant_herb_aeonium.name: Aeonium
item_raw_material_plant_herb_aeonium.description: A striking succulent with rosette-shaped leaves, its unique appearance adding a touch of exotic beauty to gardens and landscapes. \nCan be gathered in Cursed Rocklands, Lands of Stone and Scrublands biomes.

item_raw_material_plant_herb_angelica.name: Angelica
item_raw_material_plant_herb_angelica.description: A regal herb of the wild, known for its fragrant blooms and aromatic leaves, lending a touch of elegance to the countryside. \nCan be gathered in Old Forest and Lands of Stone biomes.

item_raw_material_plant_herb_beebalm.name: Bee Balm
item_raw_material_plant_herb_beebalm.description: A fragrant herb of the wild, its vibrant blooms attract bees and butterflies, filling the air with a sweet aroma and adding a splash of color to meadows and gardens alike. \nCan be gathered in Old Forest, Forsaken Forest and Grasslands biomes.

item_raw_material_plant_herb_cobralily.name: Cobra Lily
item_raw_material_plant_herb_cobralily.description: A fascinating carnivorous plant, its hooded structure and intricate patterns lure unsuspecting prey, embodying nature's ingenuity and the beauty of adaptation. \nCan be gathered in Drowned Lands.

item_raw_material_plant_herb_fennel.name: Fennel
item_raw_material_plant_herb_fennel.description: A fragrant herb with feathery leaves and a licorice-like flavor, prized for its culinary versatility and digestive properties, adding depth to dishes and delighting the palate. \nCan be gathered in The Pale in the Wildlands.

item_raw_material_plant_herb_garlic.name: Garlic
item_raw_material_plant_herb_garlic.description: A small miracle of nature. \nCan be gathered in Old Forest and Evergreen Forest biomes.

item_raw_material_plant_herb_hellebore.name: Hellebore
item_raw_material_plant_herb_hellebore.description: A resilient flower of winter's embrace, its elegant blooms defy the cold, bringing hope and beauty to the frost-kissed landscape with their subtle charm and quiet strength. \nCan be gathered in Evergreen Forest in the Home Valleys.

item_raw_material_plant_herb_lemongrass.name: Lemongrass
item_raw_material_plant_herb_lemongrass.description: A fragrant herb with slender stalks and a citrusy aroma, prized for its culinary uses and refreshing scent, infusing dishes with zesty flavor and invigorating the senses. \nCan be gathered in Lands of Stone in the Wildlands.

item_raw_material_plant_herb_lily.name: Lily of the Valley
item_raw_material_plant_herb_lily.description: A delicate woodland flower, its tiny bell-shaped blooms exude a sweet fragrance, evoking the magic of springtime and adding a touch of enchantment to shaded gardens. \nCan be gathered in Grasslands and Scrublands biomes.

item_raw_material_plant_herb_mandrake.name: Mandrake
item_raw_material_plant_herb_mandrake.description: A mystical herb with forked roots, steeped in legend and folklore, believed to possess magical properties and ancient wisdom, shrouded in mystery and reverence throughout the ages. \nCan be gathered in Evergreen Forest and Eerie Pines biomes in the Wildlands.

item_raw_material_plant_herb_meadowsweet.name: Meadowsweet
item_raw_material_plant_herb_meadowsweet.description: A graceful wildflower with clusters of fragrant white blooms, known for its delicate beauty and herbal remedies, gracing meadows and stream banks with its serene presence. \nCan be gathered in all biomes near water.

item_raw_material_plant_herb_mistletoe.name: Mistletoe
item_raw_material_plant_herb_mistletoe.description: A symbol of holiday tradition and romance, its evergreen leaves and white berries evoke festive cheer and the promise of affectionate kisses beneath its boughs. \nCan be gathered in Old Forest and Forsaken Forest biomes in the Wildlands.

item_raw_material_plant_herb_mustard.name: Mustard
item_raw_material_plant_herb_mustard.description: Fiery flowers from ancient seeds, enlivens feasts. \nCan be gathered in Scrublands.

item_raw_material_plant_herb_parsley.name: Parsley
item_raw_material_plant_herb_parsley.description: A versatile herb with vibrant green leaves, prized for its fresh flavor and culinary versatility, adding a pop of color and a burst of freshness to dishes both savory and sweet. \nCan be gathered in Drowned Lands.

item_raw_material_plant_herb_rosemary.name: Rosemary
item_raw_material_plant_herb_rosemary.description: Fragrant herb with pine-like aroma, adding robust flavor to dishes. \nCan be gathered in The Pale.

item_raw_material_plant_herb_sage.name: Sage
item_raw_material_plant_herb_sage.description: Fragrant herb, adds savory flavor to dishes. \nCan be gathered in Grasslands.

item_raw_material_plant_herb_snapdragon.name: Snapdragon
item_raw_material_plant_herb_snapdragon.description: A charming flower with colorful blossoms resembling dragon mouths, bringing whimsy and vibrancy to gardens and bouquets, enchanting all who behold its playful allure. \nCan be gathered in Cursed Rocklands and Lands of Stone biomes.

item_raw_material_plant_herb_thyme.name: Thyme
item_raw_material_plant_herb_thyme.description: A fragrant herb with tiny leaves, prized for its versatility and earthy flavor, adding depth to culinary dishes and herbal remedies alike. \nCan be gathered in Lands of Stone.

item_raw_material_plant_herb_watercress.name: Watercress
item_raw_material_plant_herb_watercress.description: Peppery aquatic herb, adds bite to salads.

item_raw_material_plant_onion_red.name: Red Onion
item_raw_material_plant_onion_red.description: A vibrant bulb of the earth, bestowing pungent flavor and colorful zest to our culinary creations, enlivening dishes with its bold presence. \nCan be gathered in Forsaken Forest.

item_raw_material_plant_onion_yellow.name: Yellow Onion
item_raw_material_plant_onion_yellow.description: A staple of the kitchen, its layers hold the essence of savory flavor, enriching dishes with its robust taste and aromatic depth. \nCan be gathered in Old Forest, Blessed Meadows and Evergreen Forest biomes.

item_raw_material_rock_flint.name: Flint
item_raw_material_rock_flint.description: Splinters with sharp edges. \nCan be gathered in all biomes in the Home Valleys near water.

item_raw_material_rock_gneiss.name: Gneiss
item_raw_material_rock_gneiss.description: Metamorphic rock, hard and sparkly. \nFound by mining Gneiss deposits and by gathering in all biomes in the Home Valleys and Wildlands.

item_raw_material_rock_granite.name: Granite
item_raw_material_rock_granite.description: A noble stone of formidable strength and enduring beauty. \nFound by mining Granite deposits in Forsaken Forest and The Pale biomes in the Wildlands.

item_raw_material_rock_limestone.name: Limestone
item_raw_material_rock_limestone.description: Durable yet porous, best kept away from the elements. \nFound by mining Limestone deposits in Scrublands, Drowned Lands and The Pale biomes.

item_raw_material_rock_sand.name: Sand
item_raw_material_rock_sand.description: Time treated rocks. \nFound by mining Copper, Gneiss, Granite, Iron, Limestone and Tin deposits in all biomes.

item_raw_material_sapwood_beech.name: Sapwood
item_raw_material_sapwood_beech.description: Easy to work and shape, but this wood type is neither very strong nor durable. \nCan be gathered in all biomes in the Home Valleys and Wildlands and chopped from trees with an axe.

item_raw_material_small_animal_hide.name: Small Animal Hide
item_raw_material_small_animal_hide.description: Stitch together enough of these to get a workable animal hide.

item_raw_material_small_animal_hide_roug.name: Small Rough Animal Hide
item_raw_material_small_animal_hide_roug.description: Stitch together enough of these to get a workable rough animal hide.

item_raw_material_soil_clay.name: Clay
item_raw_material_soil_clay.description: Soft, until baked. \nCan be gathered in all biomes near water.

item_unlock_crafter_jewelcrafting_workbe.name: Jewelcrafting Tools
item_unlock_crafter_jewelcrafting_workbe.description: Required to craft the Jeweler Table.

item_unlock_crafter_leatherworking_workb.name: Basic Leatherworking Tools
item_unlock_crafter_leatherworking_workb.description: Required to craft the Simple Leatherworking Table.

item_unlock_crafter_leatherworking_workb.name: Leatherworking Tools
item_unlock_crafter_leatherworking_workb.description: Required to craft the Leatherworking Table.

item_unlock_crafter_tailoring_workbench_.name: Basic Tailoring Tools
item_unlock_crafter_tailoring_workbench_.description: Required to craft the Simple Tailoring Table and the Spinning Wheel.

item_unlock_crafter_tailoring_workbench_.name: Tailoring Tools
item_unlock_crafter_tailoring_workbench_.description: Required to craft the Tailoring Table and the Loom.

item_vial_large.name: Large Vial
item_vial_large.description: Some would call it a bottle.

item_vial_medium.name: Vial
item_vial_medium.description: The shade of the thick glass obscures the contents.

item_vial_tiny.name: Tiny Vial
item_vial_tiny.description: When a drop is all that is needed.

item_vial_very_small.name: Small Vial
item_vial_very_small.description: Fits in the palm of your hand.
